modal_calories_body: Here is your daily or weekly calorie counter display, as set on your profile page. You can modify the maximum limit anytime you wish.
modal_macros_body: Here you can see your daily macros in relation to the maximum values set in your profile.
modal_score_body: Unsure when to eat on this diet? Tap ChatAI and get a personalized eating schedule from the AI tailored to your plan.
modal_exercise_body: You can enter the calories you burned during exercise, and they will be subtracted from your total calories consumed.
food_not_recognized: Food not recognized. Please try again!
diet_not_selected: Please select a diet plan to calculate your score. With a diet plan, your score can help you reach your goals more effectively.
error_delete: Failed to delete the message. Please try again.
